attributes.action: Change the age of consent to 18 years old
attributes.additional_details: 18years and under are still classed as a child and if buying cigerettes or going into a nightclub are over 18/21 then this should be made illegal
attributes.background: Change the age of consent to 18 years old as they are still teenagers so classed as children

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631187
